physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery and mirror work. The piece is decorated with stylized depictions of peacocks, and animals. There are seven small mirror pieces attached to the textile. In the center, there is a sewn-on inscription. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a square top and seven dangling panels along the bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works)
